1299650.name: Chemistry My Love
1299650.description:
Chemistry My Love is the ultimate gamified educational tool for high school and college level chemistry.

Balance chemical reactions, calculate mass of substrates and products, mix and dilute solutions.
Solve your exercises, having all calculations explained step-by-step by a virtual teacher.
Explore the full periodic table of elements with the most recent data from IUPAC.
Level up your knowledge playing chemical games and solving computer-generated quizzes.
